verbs.description: [ARG0: annual walk run] [V: raises] [ARG1: funds for abilis runners and walkers] [ARGM-PRP: helped raise money for abilis at the 13th annual abilis run walk at greenwich point park on sunday the greenwich- and stamford - based non - profit provides support and services for individuals with special needs and their families the event featured a competitive 3 mile run followed by children activities and a one mile family fun run walk abilis solutions old greenwich greenwich abilis old greenwich connecticut conn abilis greenwich stephen halper greenwich point park]
